title: Khanda
description: The Khanda, the symbol of the Sikhism.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Khanda emoji is rendered with striking clarity, its metallic sheen catching the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The circular emblem and crossed swords are depicted with sharp, defined edges and subtle gradients, conveying a sense of strength and spiritual devotion. This symbol of Sikhism is presented with a dignified and respectful aesthetic, as seen across Appleâ€™s emoji collection, embodying faith and unity.
